oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crayon print of Alfred Carter Williams
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 2nd Lt. Williams (1824-1900) served in Co. F, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. He joined in 1863 and is buried in Buckles Cemetery. This framed crayon print is taken from a photograph of Lt. Williams in uniform with his officer's epaulets.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Williams, Alfred Carter
